issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Works fine for iPhone4s(iOS 5.1)

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Run Accessibility_module test app using attached js file.
2. Open "Acceptance" tab
3. Try to open Acceptance Access_1004 test app when Settings>General>Accebility>VoiceOver is turned off.

Actual: On scrolling above Acceptance Access_1004 app seems to be available but soon is out of sight.

Expected: Acceptance Access_1004 must be available and should not scroll back on its own and become out of sight.
fields.summary: iOS7: Top most row item is not visible and scrolls offscreen after scrolling upwards.
fields.environment:
OSX: 10.8.4
Xcode:5.0
Appcelerator Studio: 3.1.3.201308302458
SDK:3.1.3.v20130904134612
acs@1.0.6
alloy:1.2.2
npm:1.3.2
titanium:3.1.2
titanium-code-processo:1.0.2
Device: iPhone4s ( iOS 7 Device)

comments.body:
One we can not run the test case since there is no ui.js and smoke.js attached.
Second we have no idea what this bug is about.

Hi Ingo,
Please find attached screenshots. Top most row item is Access1004, which is not visible in iOS7. Its visible when scrolled up. But soon it scrolls off-screen.
I have also verified same in iPod touch3 (iOS6.1.3) wherein "Access1004" is top most row item as expected.
SDK used was same in all 3 devices:3.1.3.v20130904134612
iPhone4s ( iOS 7 Device), iPod touch3 (iOS6.1.3),iPhone4s (v5.1).

Hope it helps.
Thanks

@[~prastogi]
Are you running the latest SDK (Both Titanium and XCode)? Is the device on the latest iOS7 version.
Few things pop out from the screen shot.

1. The Tab Group is not full screen and it should be.
2. The nav bar is not translucent (since you can not see the tableView row behind it which you would if it was)

I personally tested this here from the internal tests repo and could not reproduce the issue. Can you please verify your setup.

I cannot reproduce this issue, using:

Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.3.201309072408
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.3.v20130910031755
Titanium SDk, build: 3.1.3.v20130904134612 (where the issue occured per Pragya)
Xcode5-DP6
CLI:3.1.2
Alloy: 1.2.2-beta
iOS 7(11A4449d which is *seed 6*)
Devices:
iPad mini iOS7(11A4449d)
iPad4 iOS7(11A4449d)
iPhone3GS iOS6.1.3
iphone5 iOS7(11A4449d)
iOS SDK7 Simulator Version 7.0 (Retina, Retina&Tall) 

We did run in to this issue though in the past
TIMOB-14271
Closing.
